projects.name: ResearchPi
projects.description: Developed a researcher discovery tool that helps students find professors for research opportunities. The application searches for researchers by author name, extracts and summarizes keywords using KeyBERT, and generates comprehensive researcher profiles including affiliation information using DeepSeek R1 LLM. This tool bridges the gap between students and potential research mentors by providing detailed insights into professors' expertise and research areas.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website (This Website)
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using Figma, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects, skills, and experiences.

projects.name: RCPC Website Development
projects.description: Contributed to Rensselaer Competitive Programming Club's website using MERN stack, focusing on frontend development and UI/UX design for the competitive programming community.

projects.name: Citrus Notes Mobile - Note Taking App
projects.description: Built a full-stack mobile app for note-taking and document management using Expo and FastAPI. Features include document scanning, file management, and secure authentication, with MongoDB storage and OpenCV integration.

projects.name: CitrusPy - Image Processing Library
projects.description: Contributed to an open-source Python library for image processing, creating reusable functions for common image manipulation tasks.

projects.name: Lethal Company Mods Development
projects.description: Developed popular mods for Lethal Company, including DessertsAndCandies and DinoNuggetScrap. Created 3D models and implemented models into the game, achieving 5,000+ downloads and contributing to 130,000+ total downloads.

projects.name: Image Stitching and Panorama Creation with SIFT, RANSAC, and Homography
projects.description: (Course Project) Implemented image stitching and panorama creation using classical computer vision techniques including SIFT, RANSAC, and homography estimation.

projects.name: Image Classification and Feature Extraction with Objects and Scenes
projects.description: (Course Project) Developed image classification systems using both classical (HOG, Bag-of-Words) and deep learning approaches for object and scene recognition.

projects.name: Object Detection with Region-based CNNs (RCNN)
projects.description: (Course Project) Implemented a region-based CNN for object detection using a modified ResNet-18 backbone, achieving strong accuracy in object classification and localization.

projects.name: Motion Segmentation and Independent Object Detection in Video Segments
projects.description: (Course Project) Developed a system to detect and segment independently moving objects in video by distinguishing camera motion from object motion using feature tracking and clustering.
